usa: J. Edgar Hoover was appointed director of the Bureau of Investigation.<sup id="cite_ref-98" class="reference">[98]</sup>
The Immigration Act Basic Law was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-99" class="reference">[99]</sup>
United States presidential election, 1924: President Calvin Coolidge defeated former Solicitor General John W. Davis and Wisconsin Senator Robert M. La Follette.[100]
